title: Napoyca Awakened
description: Archeologist Mackenzie Allen likes getting her hands dirty excavating and documenting the history of Amelia Island, particularly the remnants of the Timucuan Indians that first settled there. Immersing herself in her work helps her pause her thoughts on two tragedies that have left her feeling hollow and drifting at sea. A chance meeting with visiting FBI Special Agent, Nico Capoletti, upsets the careful indifference that she has struggled to maintain in her life.Nico is feeling at sea himself with a failed romantic relationship and a recent transfer from the Boston to the Jacksonville Field Office. His work in the sex crimes unit consumes him and he hopes a much-needed weekend break on Amelia Island will help him recharge.Mackenzie’s and Nico’s chance meeting on the beautiful sand beaches of Amelia Island (known as Napoyca to the Timucuans) will engulf them in dangerous forces working toward their downfall and start a romance that will need to defy the odds stacking up against them.CONTENT WARNINGThis book contains sensitive subject matter and concepts that readers may find unsettling including themes of emotional abuse, sexual assault and sexual situations, child abuse and pedophilia, and adult language. Reader discretion is advised.
author: Elizabeth M. Carola
